name: Duck Duck Goose Pro
description:
All the Fun, None of the Ads.

Cute, Adorable duck duck, goose walk across your mobile phone or tablet. Be careful, try to knock down the Duck, Duck, Goose. Stay away from the chicken or you lose a life. Duck Duck Goose is amazing fun, extremely addictive and keeps you coming back again and again. This is the funnest bird tapping game and it is at your finger tips.

Collect these cute ducks and gooses. There are 3 games to choose from. Easy if you want to play it safe, Advanced when you are looking for a great challenge or play the Timer version against the clock. But watch out for the sneaky chickens who are talking by.

Download Duck Duck Goose today!
